Name: Forget-me-not
About the game: Iris had never planned for her life to end up so mundane. Graduating and immediately taking her first job offer, she soon discovers she would be getting underpaid and heavily overworked. One day, straying from her auto-piloted route from work to do some errands, she discovers a flower shop. Sage, the owner of the store, continues to see her odd and out of place customer visit more and more often. As days turn into weeks, the comfort of after-work visits becomes the norm, until one day, they stop.
